#green = LED(27)

    def retranslateUi(self, MainWindow):
        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
        MainWindow.setWindowTitle(_translate("MainWindow", "On / off & PWM"))
        self.pushButton.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Led 1"))
        self.pushButton_2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Led 2"))
        self.label_2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Daniel ricardo quiroga contreras"))
        self.label_3.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Pwm Led 3"))
        self.label_4.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Pwm Led 4"))

    def led_1(self):
         global a
         a = a+1
         if a==1:
          #yellow.on()
          self.pushButton.setStyleSheet("background-color:yellow") #coloca amarillo
          
          
         if a ==2:
          #yellow.off()
          self.pushButton.setStyleSheet("background-color:rgb(255,255,255)") #retorna a blanco
          a=0
          
    def led_2(self):
         global b
         b = b+1
         if b==1:
          #green.on()
          self.pushButton_2.setStyleSheet("background-color:lightgreen")
         if b ==2:
          #green.off()
          self.pushButton_2.setStyleSheet("background-color:rgb(255,255,255)")
          b=0
         
import logo_rc

    

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import sys
    app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
    MainWindow = QtWidgets.QMainWindow()
    ui = Ui_MainWindow()
    ui.setupUi(MainWindow)
    MainWindow.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
